instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE' and tap Apps . Tap the desired application. Tap Storage . Tap Clear Data . Tap OK . Tap Clear Cache .
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE' and tap Apps . If necessary, scroll to the 'DOWNLOADED' tab. Tap the desired application. Tap Uninstall . Tap OK .
